Description: Sets the [maximum memory](https://docs.redislabs.com/latest/rs/administering/designing-production/hardware-requirements/) that the Redis server can use

Config file settings for the Redis server can be set in 'redis.conf'. Consult the 'redis.conf.dist' (and if relevant 'redist-full.conf.dist') for available options for the current Redis version. Use with care

Specifies [additional command line arguments](https://redis.io/docs/latest/develop/tools/cli/) (arguments that begin with a - (dash)) for the Redis client run by AMP that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care

Sets the Redis release stream from which to install the latest version, unless a specific version is specified under Redis Version. WARNING: SWITCHING BETWEEN RELEASE STREAMS MAY CORRUPT DATA! Update the server after changing this setting

Sets the [Redis version](https://github.com/redis/redis/releases) to install. Empty = latest version for the release stream specified under Redis Release Stream. WARNING: SWITCHING BETWEEN RELEASE STREAMS MAY CORRUPT DATA! Update the server after changing this setting
